list.description: Total duration of hackathon is 12 hours.
Must register for the Summit, to participate in the Hackathon.
At least 1 Girl member in each team.
The theme is #HackForWomen, more details will be updated soon.

list.heading: 1. Career and Motherhood- How to restart?
list.description1: - Sareeta was a Php developer in 2014 when she got married. She didn’t want to leave her development job and get married but she also understood her parent’s feelings and also needed a partner. When she took a career break, within 2014-2019 the tech world has changed tremendously.
list.description2: What she could have done to remain updated? Moreover, she is now a mother of a 3 year old, how can she start her career again and still play a role of being a mother? What can be done to upskill?
